General.Name: Ekovest Bhd
General.Description: Ekovest Berhad, an investment holding company, is involved in the civil engineering and building works in Malaysia. It operates through Construction Operations, Property Development, Toll Operations, Plantation, Food and Beverages, Property Investment, and Others segments. Its civil engineering and building works include turnkey, design, and build projects, and project management. The company also acts as a project coordinator and manager for "River of Life' project; and designs, constructs, operates, manages, and maintains Duta-Ulu Kelang and Setiawangsa-Pantai expressways. In addition, it is involved in the renewable energy activity; construction, operation, management, and maintenance of a park and ride building; operation, maintenance, and harvesting of durian plantation; management of contract farming; operation of hotels and restaurants; and sale of food and beverage products. Further, the company owns, manages, and operates forest plantation; trades in fresh and processed fruits, and commercial goods; and manages and operates oil palm plantation, as well as forest logging, saw milling, chipping, other downstream, manufacturing, and related activities. The company was formerly known as Ekovest Bina Sdn. Bhd. and changed its name to Ekovest Berhad in 1992. Ekovest Berhad was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
